verses.name: Luke 12:4
verses.text: And I say unto you my friends, Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do.

verses.name: Luke 12:5
verses.text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.

verses.name: Luke 12:6
verses.text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings, and not one of them is forgotten before God?

verses.name: Luke 12:7
verses.text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear not therefore: ye are of more value than many sparrows.
